alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Eastern Magic Valley; Lost River Range; Lost River Valleys; Lower Snake River Plain; Shoshone, Lava Beds; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 2:53PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...LINE OF THUNDERSTORMS MOVING EAST THROUGH THE CENTRAL SNAKE RIVER PLAIN TOWARD ARCO, HOWE, AND STERLING THROUGH 345 PM MDT... At 250 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of thunderstorms extending from 14 miles east of Darlington to near Central Inl to 12 miles west of Aberdeen. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Brief moderate to heavy rain, wind gusts of 30 to 40 mph, and pea sized hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Arco, American Falls Reservoir, Aberdeen, Atomic City, Central Inl, Taber, Southeast Inl, Southwest Inl, Northwest Inl, Springfield, Rockford, Pingree, Moore, Butte City, Sterling, East Butte, Big Southern Butte, Coxs Well Airport and Howe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
